document.full_text: european nations moved on wednesday to have the u.n. security council pass a resolution condemning syria for its bloody crackdown against pro-democracy protesters, diplomats said.
document.title: eu powers ask u.n. security council to condemn syria
lines_and_colors: european nations moved on wednesday to have the u.n. security council pass a resolution condemning syria for its bloody crackdown against pro-democracy protesters, diplomats said.
